oracle.jbo.jbotester.cl
Interface ITesterBinding

All Known Implementing Classes:
TesterBinding
public interface ITesterBinding

This interface is mainly used by the tester's MainFrame, to access the (datacontrol) binding, which is created in the application context.

Since:
release specific (what release of product did this appear in)
